title: Market Power Mitigation Analysis
description: An ISO market monitor is analyzing bidding behavior to detect if a generator is attempting to exercise market power (i.e., 'economic withholding').

tasks.description: Monitor the bids submitted by all major generators.
tasks.expected_outcome: System is continuously ingesting market bid data.

tasks.description: The system flags a generator that is bidding its capacity at a price significantly higher than its estimated marginal cost, especially during a constrained period.
tasks.expected_outcome: System's algorithm detects anomalous bidding behavior.

tasks.description: Automatically mitigate the bid by capping it at a reference level.
tasks.expected_outcome: System automatically replaces the high bid with a more reasonable, cost-based bid.

tasks.description: Refer the incident to the enforcement department for further investigation.
